name: Timmys World
description:
In TimmysWorld you will help Timmy fight against fantasy monsters while avoiding obstacles.

Controls:

Left: A

Right: D

Jump: SPACE (the longer the higher)

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

I created this game as part of Brackey's GameJam 2022.1. Unfortunately I didn't have that much time to work on the game during the week. Still, it was a very fun and exciting experience. Thanks for that @Brackeys :D

And thanks to my girlfriend for her patience on the phone in the evening, when I was working on the game under time pressure <3

Developer: RaphiGamedev

Instagram: https://instagram.com/raphigamedev
